schema.description: Statistics of SRV6 ping and trace tests.

srv6-ping-trace-result-type.description: List of SRV6 ping and trace tests.

ping-results.description: List of test result of SRV6 ping.

ping-result.description: Statistics of test result of SRV6 ping.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-average.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

destination.description: Local IPv6 address or SRv6 local SID of the destination.

segment-lists.description: List of segment information in a test.

segment-list.description: Statistics of segment information in a test.

probes.description: List of ping results of all packets in a test.

probe.description: Statistics of ping result of a single packet in a test.

sequence.description: Serial number of a test packet received by a certain hop.

replier.description: Destination address of the related hop in a test.

data-bytes.description: Number of bytes in a received response packet.

hop-limit.description: Hop limit of received response packets.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either success or timeout.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

trace-results.description: List of test result list of trace.

trace-result.description: Statistics of test result of ping.

destination.description: Local IPv6 address or SRv6 local SID of the destination.

segment-lists.description: List of segment information in a test.

segment-list.description: Statistics of segment information in a test.

hops.description: List of trace results of all packets in a test.

hop.description: Statistics of ping result of a single packet in a test.

hop-index.description: Hop limit of received response packets.

replier.description: Destination address of the related hop in a test.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.
